Package org.bohdansharubin.models

Class Shirt

java.lang.Object
org.bohdansharubin.models.Clothes
org.bohdansharubin.models.Shirt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Clothes>
public class Shirt extends Clothes
Represents a Shirt item.

A Shirt is a concrete subclass of Clothes with a fixed ClothesType.SHIRT type. The type of Shirt instance cannot be changed after creation.

Additional characteristic specific to Shirt is its SleeveLength.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shirt

      public Shirt(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize)
      Constructs a Shirt with the specified basic parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the shirt; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid

    • Shirt

      public Shirt(String color, int europeanSize, AmericanSize americanSize, SleeveLength sleeveLength)
      Constructs a Shirt with the specified parameters including sleeve length.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the shirt; must not be null or blank
      europeanSize - the European size; must be within the valid range
      americanSize - the American size; must not be null
      sleeveLength - the sleeve length; may be null if not specified
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid
